casebody.data:
State
v.
Alonzo Antonio Murrell 233P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 22, 2016

James W. Carter, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorneys at Law, Daniel Lawrence Spiegel, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Murrell, Alonzo Antonio.

Oliver G. Wheeler, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of June 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of June 2016."
